Talents.Name: An Everyman's Wish
Talents.Description: Healing targets gain status resistance for 4 seconds. If the target's HP is above 75%, they gain status resistance for 6 seconds instead.

Talents.Name: Quick Fix
Talents.Description: When an ally within range receives a negative status, heal them for 80% of <Operator Name>'s ATK. 12 seconds cooldown.
